main.name: Calvin Nguyen
main.description: A senior student with 2+ years working with Node.js/MongoDB. Strong experience building Web/iOS apps and has a great Payment background.
main.bio: Hi, I'm Calvin, a self-motivated undergraduate senior at SJSU, San Jose, CA. I've experienced in both web & mobile (Android, iOS) platforms, focusing on full-stack web development. I love to design and architect web back-end API and databases for scalability.
main.contactmessage: My inbox is always open. Whether for a potential project or just to say hi, I'll try my best to answer your email!
